name: Spinbase Daily
script: sudo ACCEPT_LICENSE=* equo i --relaxed --norecursive mail-mta/postfix net-p2p/mktorrent-borg sys-fs/dosfstools dev-util/molecule dev-vcs/git app-misc/ca-certificates app-emulation/docker app-emulation/docker-companion sys-process/tini sys-boot/syslinux sys-fs/squashfs-tools app-cdr/cdrtools sys-fs/udftools
sudo MOLECULE_ISO_TITLE=SABAYON SABAYON_INSTALL_KERNEL=1 DRACUT=1 SABAYON_EXTRA_PKGS=sys-libs/pam /sabayon_molecules.sh run daily --image spinbase --skip-docker-rmi --skip-dev
